title: Breaking Down ‘Game of Thrones,’ S8E3 | The Watch
description:
The Battle of Winterfell finally happened (1:01). We talk about the visual effects of the battle (7:29), who lived and who died (21:54), and the difficulties of trying to wrap up a major and beloved franchise (30:43).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
